original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā purāṇarājorodhā bhikkhunīsu pabbajitā hoti.
analyzed: ▁tena ▁kho ▁pana ▁samayena ▁aññatar ā ▁purāṇ a rāj o ro dhā ▁bhikkhunī su ▁pabbajit ā ▁hoti

original: Aññatarā bhikkhunī anabhiratiyā pīḷitā yena sā bhikkhunī tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṁ bhikkhuniṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: ▁aññatar ā ▁bhikkhunī ▁anabhi rati yā ▁ pīḷ itā ▁yena ▁sā ▁bhikkhunī ▁tenupasaṃkami ▁upasaṃkamitvā ▁taṃ ▁bhikkhu ni ṃ ▁etadavoca
▁kiṃ ▁etaṃ ▁a yy e ▁ja tum aṭṭh ak anti

original: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī tassā bhikkhuniyā jatumaṭṭhakaṁ ācikkhi.
Atha kho sā bhikkhunī jatumaṭṭhakaṁ ādiyitvā dhovituṁ vissaritvā ekamantaṁ chaḍḍesi.
analyzed: ▁atha ▁kho ▁sā ▁bhikkhunī ▁ja tum aṭṭh akaṃ ▁ādi y itvā ▁dhov ituṃ ▁v issar itvā ▁ekamantaṃ ▁chaḍḍ esi
▁bhikkhuniyo ▁ makkh ikā hi ▁sam pari kiṇṇa ṃ ▁pass itvā ▁evamāhaṃsu

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī jatumaṭṭhakaṁ ādiyissati.
evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—

analyzed: ▁ja tu may aṃ ▁ kaṭṭh ama yaṃ ▁ pi ṭṭha may aṃ ▁ matt ikā may aṃ

original: samphassaṁ sādiyantī antamaso uppalapattampi muttakaraṇaṁ paveseti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: ▁ samphass aṃ ▁sādiy antī ▁antamaso ▁ uppal apatt ampi ▁mutt akaraṇ aṃ ▁paves eti ▁āpatti ▁pācittiy assa
